404.unavailable: The page you are looking for might have been removed had its name changed or is temporarily unavailable.

500.oops: Oops.. It seems like something is broken here.
500.fix: We will get to fix this soon

landing-page.who-we-are-description:
We are a platform that want to give people the power to build community and bring the thoughts closer together.
We empower lot of people to share ideas, offer support and make a difference.
It's known that everyone cares about the work they’re doing. and our duty is to help our community have the safest and most positive experiences possible.
landing-page.quote: As a community manager, organizing thoughts never been easier.
landing-page.principles: Our principles are what we stand for. They are beliefs we hold deeply and make trade offs to pursue.
landing-page.principle-1: People deserve to be heard and to have a voice — even when that means defending the right of people we disagree with.
landing-page.principle-2: Our services help people connect, and when they’re at their best they make thoughts easier to accomplish together.
landing-page.principle-3-header: Keep People Safe and Protect Privacy
landing-page.principle-3: We have a responsibility to promote the best of what people can do together by keeping people safe and preventing harm.
landing-page.principle-4: Since that sharing ideas and thougt keeps the communities vital, the term of "Enhanced" is what we seek to accomplish in this platform.
landing-page.karkotly-bio: Front End Developer, My role is to write and style the front-end components that meet the requirements of our mocks and fulfill our user stories. I also monitor and process pull requests for production deployments. Technologies used: Angular, JavaScript, ES6, TypeScript, SCSS
landing-page.majd-bio: Serve as a visionary for social media and digital content strategy, acting as a proactive subject matter expert in social and digital media and developing team guidelines, Establish objectives and develop strategic and technical plans for implementing social media campaigns
landing-page.nour-bio: Worked and collaborated with marketing, key executives, UI designers, architects, engineers, and product management to deliver user-friendly and visually appealing mobile apps for both Android & iOS platforms. Just another line here and we are done. Technologies used: Flutter, Dart.
landing-page.opinion-important: Your opinion is important to us!
landing-page.name: Name
landing-page.subject: Subject

login.username-min-length: Username must be at least 2 characters long
login.username-max-length: Username cannot be more than 30 characters long
login.password-min-length: Password must be at least 8 characters long

sign-up.invitation-option: Would you like other people to invite you to other communities?
